info.name: Recolor/remove notification bells
info.description: Under Customize Settings on this page, you choose to remove or recolor any phase of the bell! It is even possible to keep the new unread message bell and remove the others. Compatible with other MAL Stylish themes.
info.additionalInfo:
To simply remove all phases of the bell: 
https://userstyles.org/styles/123388/myanimelist-remove-the-notification-bell

settings.label: Change "inherit" to "none" to remove new unread message bell (orange by default)
Change "inherit" to "none" to remove unread message bell (darker blue by default)
Change "inherit" to "none" to remove All Messages Marked Read Bell (lighter blue by default)
